name: Flutterdrone
description:
Pilot the Flutterdrone, flapping through weapon filled caves and tight passages, how far can you get? Flutterdrone is a procedurally generated flutter game that becomes more and more difficult as it progresses.

Made for Hectic Games Jam #7 with the theme 'Puppetmaster' where it placed 2nd overall and won the "Highest in Gameplay" and "Highest in Replayability" awards.

Game by Jamie Rollo,
Music by Jared Hahn.
